column4: umm..... I have a router... (192.168.0.1) and i want my machine to be 192.168.0.242....  uuuummmm..... how?
can anyone help me set my IP(dnt have a GUI)
what are you trying to do?
why do you need to set the IP address to something that specific?
try googling for something like "ubuntu set static ip"
E: Package ssh-server has no installation candidate
